description: Create a unified payment provider interface that abstracts Stripe, PayPal, and Square APIs. Include provider factory pattern, common payment models, and error handling strategy.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Provider interface supports charge, refund, and void operations; 2. Factory pattern selects provider based on configuration; 3. Common PaymentResult model returned by all providers; 4. Provider-specific errors mapped to unified error codes; 5. Unit tests achieve 90% coverage

description: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization server with support for authorization code flow with PKCE, client credentials flow, and refresh token rotation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Authorization code flow with PKCE implemented per RFC 7636; 2. Client credentials flow for service-to-service auth; 3. Refresh token rotation with automatic revocation; 4. Token introspection endpoint available; 5. All flows pass OWASP security checklist

description: Redesign order processing to use event sourcing and CQRS pattern. Implement order state machine with RabbitMQ for async event handling.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Order aggregate with event sourcing implemented; 2. State machine handles: Created, Confirmed, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled; 3. RabbitMQ consumers process events asynchronously; 4. Order projection updated in read model; 5. Saga pattern handles multi-service transactions
